Welcome to table_extraction’s documentation!

This package can extract several tables from a large table (a pandas DataFrame).

The main application is extracting several tables from an Excel file, which is useful because many tables are often located in a single tab for convenience.

For extracting tables:

  • from a pandas DataFrame: use table_extraction.find_all_table_range().

  • from a Excel file: use excel_table_conversion.ExcelTableConverter. For an example usage, refer to the source code of convert module (convert.py).
